content:
Why is the add_local_native_libraries(compiler\rustc_codegen_ssa\src\back\link.rs:2033) function not implemented for NativeLibKind::RawDylib?
This crashes rustc for me:
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'compiler\rustc_codegen_ssa\src\back\link.rs:2031:17: raw_dylib feature not yet implemented
Is there some way around this?
raw-dylib is currently only partially implemented. i believe it only somewhat supports windows msvc at the moment.

bjorn3 said:

what did you try to do?

I'm currently trying to implement a pure Rust target for Windows(no msvc) and for that, I use raw-dylib in std. But (as I described above) it crashes during compilation.
Does it work if you put the extern block of the raw-dylib in a dependency of the main crate?
